ItemTooltips.blink: If your team needs a more reliable initiate
ItemTooltips.blades_of_attack: Due to Invoker's low base damage, not taking Exort requires a blades of attack to last hit properly
ItemTooltips.tango: You'll be focusing on Quas early game, so this is all the regen you'll be needing
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Getting these as early as possible makes a huge difference last hitting
ItemTooltips.bracer: To build into a drum later
ItemTooltips.cyclone: In case of mana problems, or if you just want to go faster
ItemTooltips.force_staff: A great positioning tool. Use it offensively and defensively to give Invoker the mobility he lacks.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Time it to get around level 17 to use with level 4 Invoke
ItemTooltips.refresher: If you're doing REALLY well. Core if you plan on making a youtube montage.
ItemTooltips.assault: For very late game, if your team requires extra physical auto-attack damage. Because you can never attack too quickly
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: If you find yourself being focused too much in fights
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Gives a whole new spell to your teamfight repertoire.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: For very late game, if your team requires extra physical auto-attack damage
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: For very late game, if your team requires extra physical auto-attack damage
ItemTooltips.skadi: For very late game, if your team requires extra physical auto-attack damage
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Some more damage, and some more speed
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: For very late game, if your team requires extra physical auto-attack damage
